definition: the chirping of birds or insects/noise/clamor/buzzing/disturbance
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to achieve fame among one's contemporaries (idiom); temporary or local celebrity
(bird species of China) Siberian jay (Perisoreus infaustus)
(bird species of China) clamorous reed warbler (Acrocephalus stentoreus)
(bird species of China) Asian koel (Eudynamys scolopaceus)
(bird species of China) giant laughingthrush (Garrulax maximus)

sentences.english: Wavelet transform and Wiener filtering are combined to denoise speech.
sentences.chinese: 将小波变换与维纳滤波结合起来对语音进行去噪。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 is aimed at the study of video denoising.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，是对视频去噪算法的研究。

sentences.english: A robust denoising algorithm for point-sampled surfaces is proposed based on sampling likelihood.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于采样保真性的点模型去噪算法。

sentences.english: Based on real gravity data, the de-noising simulation experiment is made.
sentences.chinese: 根据实测重力数据，进行了去噪仿真试验。

sentences.english: The theories of MDL denoising and blind deconvolution are firstly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 首先简单介绍了小波软阈值去噪和盲目反卷积原理。

sentences.english: The engineering image denoising is realized with MATLAB software system.
sentences.chinese: 应用MATLAB软件系统实现工程图像的去噪。

sentences.english: Hence, An identification algorithm based on wavelet and least absolute errors (WLA) is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 为此，在小波去噪的基础上，提出了一种最小。

sentences.english: The denoising method in range domain has a better performance compared to the other one.
sentences.chinese: 通过分析比较，距离域去噪方法更为有效。

sentences.english: The theme is about de-noising of speech with noise and speech recognition.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究被噪声干扰的语音信号的去噪和识别课题。

sentences.english: De-noising of digital images has become more and more important with the widespread and rapid growth of digital media and network communication.
sentences.chinese: 小波图象去噪已经成为目前图象去噪的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: De-noising of digital images has become more and more important with the widespread and rapid growth of digital media and network communication.
sentences.chinese: 小波图象去噪已经成为目前图象去噪的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: In this paper, a new snore denoising method based on wavelet entropy is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的基于小波熵的弱鼾音信号去噪方法。

sentences.english: A class of augment multiscale autoregression model based on wavelet denoise was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 建立了基于小波去噪的增强多尺度自回归模型。

sentences.english: The result shows that the strength noise segments are detected accurately and the method of denoising are efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明该方法能够准确检出强噪声段，有效去噪。

sentences.english: This paper presented a new method based on nonlinear wavelet transform to image de-noising .
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的非线性小波变换去噪方法。

sentences.english: A wavelet reconstruction algorithm based on non-separable MRA is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于不可分离MRA的小波去噪重建算法。

definition: variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
a sound/a noise/musical pipe with 3 reeds
to be a noise in the world/to acquire notoriety
cry of a crane or wild goose
medial (i.e. middle vowel of a syllable in Asian phonetics)
